title: Json serialization error with Kotlin
body:
### Describe the bug

Hello 

I return a simple data object in Kotlin 

And this error appears 


```
Request failed: kotlinx.serialization.SerializationException: Serializer for class 'Trade' is not found.
Mark the class as @Serializable or provide the serializer explicitly.
```

I use the last version of Kotlin, Java and Quarkus 
Built the project from here https://code.quarkus.io/

Please find a zip with an example 


[Api.zip](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/8706841/Api.zip)


You can run `http://localhost:8080/trades/1` and see the result 



Best 


### Expected behavior

No error

### Actual behavior

an error 

### How to Reproduce?

just run the server  `http://localhost:8080/trades/1`
